title: What's new in version 1.5.0

title: What's new in version 1.4.2
text: A very requested feature was added: Dual mining on Ezil Pool! This version also fixes some bugs and adds a 'Report Bug' functionality to the app.

title: Please, rate this app!
text: If you're feeling generous with your time, please support me by leaving a nice review in the App Store. As an independent developer, it means the world to me. Thank you!

title: T-Rex Miner 100% LHR Unlock
text:
Nvidia miners rejoice! T-Rex miner 0.26.x was officially released with 100% LHR unlock for most LHR cards (except RTX 3080 12GB and RTX 3050).

If you're a HiveOS user and want to update you need to:

1) Update your HiveOS to the latest version
2) Unset your Flight Sheet
3) Update your Nvidia drivers to 510.xx (you can run the nvidia-driver-update command)
4) Edit your Flight Sheet, click on 'Setup Miner Config' over T-Rex Miner and select version 0.26.x, then click on Apply Changes
5) Reboot
6) Set your Flight Sheet again
7) Enjoy!

 For Windows users:

1) Update your Nvidia driver to 512.xx
2) Install T-Rex 0.26.x
3) Reboot
4) Start mining again and enjoy!
